page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: {MY HOUSE (CONT. FROM P. 18) Our stairs are in our dining room and upstairs we have a landing,a bathroom and 3 bedrooms.My bedroom has magazines all over the floor and posters of Nik Kershaw,Duran Duran,Wham and Frankie Goes To Hollywood{(all pop stars)}covering the wallpaper and walls. From my window you can see the street and also the playing field.We have a fairly big back garden with our dustbin and flowersin it.We have a fair sizedfront garden with our drive and trees in it. My dad has a blue Vauxhall and my mum has a white Citroen(cars)which belongs to the the person she works for.My sister is an untidy wretch so is my dad all my mum seems to be doing is tidying up after us.
